rules: Rule1: Either an export license is granted in region A for crop X, or, if it is not the case that whenever weather monitoring is active in region A with technology Z then water supply is adequate in region A for crop X, then pesticide is used in region A with tool Y.
Rule2: A subsidy is received in region A, or, provided that fertilizer is applied in region A using tool Y, then yield is increased in region A for crop X.

Rule3: Whenever training is provided in region A for farmers, then, if government support is available for region A, either research funding is approved for region A or a subsidy is not received in region A.

Rule4: Provided that a technical manual is issued in region A, then, under the condition that government support is available for region A, either research funding is approved for region A or it is not the case that a subsidy is received in region A.
Rule5: If expert consultation is scheduled for region A, then either training is provided in region A for farmers or a technical manual is issued in region A.
Rule6: Under the condition that a field demonstration is organized in region A, then either training is provided in region A for farmers or a technical manual is issued in region A.
Rule7: If market demand is high in region A for crop X, then it is not the case that the harvest is successful in region A for crop X.

Rule8: Whenever a climate alert is issued for region A, then, if it is not the case that whenever a drought is declared in region A, then, under the condition that normal weather conditions do not prevail in region A, the harvest is not successful in region A for crop X, then emergency aid is requested for region A, then disaster relief is deployed to region A.
Rule9: Provided that an irrigation system using technology Z is installed in region A, then weather monitoring is active in region A with technology Z.
Rule10: Whenever water supply is adequate in region A for crop X, then, if normal weather conditions do not prevail in region A, market demand is high in region A for crop X.
Rule11: Under the condition that fertilizer is applied in region A using tool Y, then soil quality is poor in region A.
Rule12: Provided that fertilizer is applied in region A using tool Y, then it is not the case that soil quality is poor in region A.
Rule13: Either fertilizer is applied in region A using tool Y, or, if an irrigation system using technology Z is installed in region A, then water supply is adequate in region A for crop X.
Rule14: Under the condition that pesticide is used in region A with tool Y, then crop disease is not detected in region A for crop X.
Rule15: If it is not the case that either expert consultation is scheduled for region A or a field demonstration is organized in region A, then the project is abandoned in region A.

Rule16: Provided that it is not the case that either expert consultation is scheduled for region A or a field demonstration is organized in region A, then it is not the case that the project is abandoned in region A.

Rule17: Under the condition that it is not the case that whenever a drought is declared in region A, then, if normal weather conditions do not prevail in region A, the harvest is not successful in region A for crop X, then it is not the case that emergency aid is requested for region A.

Rule18: Provided that it is not the case that whenever weather monitoring is active in region A with technology Z then water supply is adequate in region A for crop X, then crop disease is detected in region A for crop X.
Rule19: If it is not the case that a climate alert is issued for region A, then an evacuation is ordered for region A.
Rule20: Provided that it is not the case that a climate alert is issued for region A, then it is not the case that an evacuation is ordered for region A.
Rule21: If normal weather conditions do not prevail in region A, then the harvest is successful in region A for crop X.
facts: Fact1: Government support is available for region A.
Fact2: A drought is declared in region A.
Fact3: An irrigation system using technology Z is installed in region A.
Fact4: It is not the case that an export license is granted in region A for crop X.
Fact5: It is not the case that yield is increased in region A for crop X.
Fact6: It is not the case that research funding is approved for region A.
Fact7: It is not the case that disaster relief is deployed to region A.

question: Normal weather conditions prevail in region A.
